title: Improved Reports: More information (Uninstall rate, Usage, etc.)
body: I'd love to have better and improved reports to improve my app and tune the descriptions of my app store listings (ASO). For this, I hope you could add the uninstall rate, usage (how often, how long a user uses my app), etc. Maybe just add the reports Android developers have in the Google Play Store. Thanks a lot!

comments.body: Agreed! It is possible to do it yourself or use openSource tools. But it would be nice to have official and thereby nice integration into dev-overview.
Yeah, there are many things that can be added to the reports, but some are specially useful, like knowing install base, no just how many downloads.
